standard.name: standard
standard.description: The default profile. Balanced for general coding tasks.

advanced.name: advanced
advanced.description: The Power User suite. Includes all engineering and quality tools, but excludes meta-agent interfaces.

oracle.name: oracle
oracle.description: Forced Agentic Flow. The user sees only one tool.

dynamic.name: dynamic
dynamic.description: The 'Master Gopher' Flow. Starts minimal, unlocks tools on demand.
